sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"countercontroller"}}>{`CounterController`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`CounterController`}</MDXTag>{` tracks a single value and provides methods for incrementing, decrementing, and setting that value.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Option`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`DefaultValue`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`initial`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`number`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`0`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}><MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="td">{`Optional`}</MDXTag>{` - The controller's initial value.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Property`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`value`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`number`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The controller's current value.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Method`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`increment()`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Increases the controller's value\` by one.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`incrementBy(num: number)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Increases the controller's value by the value of `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`num`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`decrement()`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Decreases the controller's value by one.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`decrementBy(num: number)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Decreases the controller's value by the value of `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`num`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`reset()`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Resets the controller to its initial value.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Example:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-tsx"}}>{`import { Override } from "framer"
import { CounterController } from "framer-controller"

const controller = new CounterController({
    initial: 10,
})

// Apply this one to a text node
const ValueDisplay: Override = () => ({
    text: controller.value,
})

const IncrementButton: Override = () => ({
    onClick: controller.increment,
})

const IncrementBy5Button: Override = () => ({
    onClick: () => controller.incrementBy(5),
})
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
